doc.title: Anachro Nation
doc.plot: 'When the Kingdom of Ealdormere is threatened by its neighbors to the south, the newly crowned King Malik must quickly mobilize his forces and prepare for the epic battle drawing near. Citizens from every corner of the kingdom must join together to lend a hand in defending their mighty homeland.' A fascinating, captivating and highly original glimpse into the world of The Society for Creative Anachronism, where members dedicate themselves to recreating the customs, costumes, and vitality of medieval Europe.
